p.s: As most of you know globalised environmental polluting is a current global issue caused by us humans.
In the following I am going to comment on this thesis.
First of all the environment gets worse every year.
There are many causes for this and the cause are our humanshumans' actions.
The biggest impact on this are the CO2carbon dioxide emissions caused by our traffic and also our synthetic detergents, nitrogen fertilizers.
Giving an example on December 3, 1984 at Bhopal as a result of toxic and poisonous leakage over 2000 people were killed and hundreds severely hurt.
We human beings losing control and become victims of our own creations.
The rapidly urbanization and rapidly increasing industrialization is in turn a product of our advancement in science and technology.
As you know it is the extinction of our flora and fauna.
There are many races that do not exist anymore.
To put it in a nutshell it is important that we humans should be aware of our actions and try to stop the polluting.
If not, there will no longer be a world for us to live.
